Class Inspector

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fel.nutforms.rules.inspection.Inspector

  • public class Inspector
extends java.lang.Object
    Inspects Drools rules and creates Rule objects from them.

      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<Rule>> inspectBase(org.kie.api.KieBase kieBase)
      Inspects packages in given KieBase and returns a map, where key is package name and value is a set of Rules from that package.

      Inspects all rules in given KiePackage and returns a set of Rules created from Drools Rules in the package (one package == single *.drl file)

      • inspectPackage

        public java.util.Set<Rule> inspectPackage(org.kie.api.definition.KiePackage kiePackage)
        Inspects all rules in given KiePackage and returns a set of Rules created from Drools Rules in the package (one package == single *.drl file)
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • inspectBase

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<Rule>> inspectBase(org.kie.api.KieBase kieBase)
        Inspects packages in given KieBase and returns a map, where key is package name and value is a set of Rules from that package.
        Parameters:
        kieBase - KieBase to be inspected
        Returns:
        map of rule sets identified by name of the context
